work.title: Moodle Course content developer
work.description: Developed assigned online course(s) within the process, schedule, guidelines, regulatory rules, and style of the company's defined expectations

work.title: Data Entry/Analysis Specialist
work.description: Compiled, sorted, verified, and corrected data to be entered,Reviewed data for completeness and accuracy.Contacted the authors of source documents to address data inconsistencies and to gather missing data.

testimonials.text: Kennyola has a great mentality that always seeks to improve his skills. Her discipline makes working with her easy and challenging at the same time. She loves to share his ideas and accomplishments with other people, which makes her very easily leave an impact in any working environment.
I worked with Kennyola as a freelance. Kennyola is detailed orientated, has advanced problem-solving skills. She has the ability to effectively manage several tasks at a time.
testimonials.user: Frank Demon | Full stack web developer
